mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_message_phone t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1'

SELECT t.ID id, t.TITLE title, t.MESSAGE message, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate FROM t_message_phone t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1' ORDER BY t.CREATE_DATA
